value.title: This Automotive Company Revs Up Machine Learning To Turbocharge Engine Quality
value.excerpt: With help from SAP, Mumbai-based MHEL replaced its outmoded physical engine testing with virtual testing – using artificial intelligence and machine learning while incorporating data from a variety of sources.

value.title: Google Tensor gets crushed by Apple A15 in machine learning despite being a ML-centric chip
value.excerpt: The Google Tensor processor is supposed be all about machine learning but it got crushed by the Apple A15 Bionic in the Geekbench ML app.

value.title: Machine learning reveals brain networks involved in child aggression
value.excerpt: Child psychiatric disorders, such as oppositional defiant disorder and attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD), can feature outbursts of anger and physical aggression. A better understanding of what drives these symptoms could help inform treatment strategies.

value.title: Extend model lineage to include ML features using Amazon SageMaker Feature Store

value.title: How machine learning speeds up Power BI reports
value.excerpt: Machine learning delivers insights in Power BI reports—and it enables you to get a large amount of data into your reports to generate those insights more quickly.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Models Predict How the Brain Processes Language
value.excerpt: Neuroscientists find the internal workings of next-word prediction models resemble those of language-processing centers in the brain.

value.title: PepsiCo hiring 150 in Dallas for new ‘digital hub’ leveraging AI and machine learning
value.excerpt: PepsiCo’s chief strategy and transformation officer describes the new high-tech team as a first for legacy consumer packaged goods brands.

value.title: Ethics guidance issued for machine learning in research
value.excerpt: The UK Statistics Authority’s Centre for Applied Data Ethics has published ethics guidance focused on the use of machine learning for research and official statistics.

value.title: Machine Learning Helps Predict Spread of Antibiotic Resistance
value.excerpt: Machine learning helps sort organisms by their functions and researchers use the days to predict how genes are transferred between them. This approach could potentially be used to stop the spread of antibiotic resistance.

value.title: Saving seaweed with machine learning
value.excerpt: Charlene Xia, a PhD candidate at MIT, is using machine learning to monitor the microbiome of seaweed farms in an effort to predict and prevent diseases before they destroy livestock.

value.title: Deep learning for reticular opacity on chest radiographs with interstitial lung disease
value.excerpt: According to ARRS’ American Journal of Roentgenology (AJR), radiologists’ sensitivity on chest radiographs for reticular opacity in patients with interstitial lung disease (ILD)—including those with mild disease—improved using a commercially available deep learning algorithm (DLA) from VUNO.

value.title: US Air Force teams with UK on machine learning demo
value.excerpt: By sharing data and machine learning algorithms, the two countries were able to improve situational awareness for war fighters in a demonstration.

value.title: How machine learning can be fair and accurate
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University researchers are challenging a long-held assumption that there is a trade-off between accuracy and fairness when using machine learning to make public policy decisions.

value.title: Machine learning can yield "proxy measures" for brain-related health issues
